question: What was R V Bhuskute, who recently passed away in Maharashtra?
explanation:
Veteran freedom fighter R V Bhuskute recently passed away at the age of 94 due to age related ailments. He had participated in the Quit India Movement and various other national events.
The veteran fighter has also written several books on land laws. He strived hard towards the release and rehabilitation of bonded labourers in tribal areas of his state, Maharashtra.
